level.heading: Findings and recommendations.
level.text: No later than 30 days prior to disbandment, the Task Force shall submit to the Mayor and the Council its findings and recommendations, including any proposed legislative changes and the estimated cost of the proposed legislation.

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 days) repeal of this section, see ยง 251 of the New Columbia Statehood Initiative, Omnibus Boards and Commissions, and Election Transition Reform Emergency Amendment Act of 2014 (D.C. Act 20-481, Nov. 18, 2014, 61 DCR 12133, 20 STAT 4405).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 16-190
level.text: For Law 16-190, see notes following ยง 2-1221.31.
